biocontainers.name: sibsim4
biocontainers.summary: Sibsim4 is a modified version of the sim4 program, which is a similarity-based tool for spliced alignments, i.e. for aligning an expressed dna sequence (est, mrna) with a genomic sequence.

biotools.summary: SIBsim4 is a modified version of the sim4 program, which is a similarity-based tool for spliced alignments, i.e. for aligning an expressed DNA sequence (EST, mRNA) with a genomic sequence.
